Record.ClassificationPath: Hemic and Lymphatic Diseases/Hematologic Diseases/Anemia/Anemia, Myelophthisic
Hemic and Lymphatic Diseases/Hematologic Diseases/Bone Marrow Diseases/Myeloproliferative Disorders/Anemia, Myelophthisic
Record.Description: Anemia characterized by appearance of immature myeloid and nucleated erythrocytes in the peripheral blood, resulting from infiltration of the bone marrow by foreign or abnormal tissue.
